alert.note: Alert for Sierra County Lakes (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 6:39PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Sierra County through 715 PM MDT... At 639 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Engle, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Sierra County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
